caption:
Hello, everyone. I’m Melissa,  a local artist in Viola Arkansas. I created this door, and if you would like to purchase it, you will need to attend the Harber family Chili Supper and Auction, where 100% of  the proceeds will go to the Harber family.
Chili Supper & Benefit Auction for Harber Cycle Family! 🏍️Join us on December 16th to rally for the Harber family, whose iconic motorcycle shop in Viola went up in flames. 🔥 They’ve been serving our community for 40 years, and now it’s our turn to give back!🛠️ Take a look around at home and maybe You have something just sitting around you’d like to donate, too. 
Let’s show 'em some love and support!🗓️ When: Saturday, December 16, 20232:00 pm: Chili Supper (Donation-based) at Viola Cafeteria4:00 pm: Auction at Viola Gymnasium🎉
